    "data": "3,24,60,720,2520,40320,181440,3628800,19958400,479001600,3113510400,87178291200,653837184000,20922789888000,177843714048000,6402373705728000,60822550204416000,2432902008176640000",
    "name": "Order of the subgroup of the symmetric group S_n generated by the cycles (1,2,3) and (1,2,3,...,n).",
    "formula": [
        "For odd n: a(n) = n!/2; for even n: a(n) = n!.",
        "a(n) = 1/4*(3+(-1)^n)*n! - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 18 2002"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "f[n_] := If[ EvenQ[n], n!, n!/2]; Table[ f[n], {n, 3, 24}]."
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) for(n=3,20,print1((3+(-1)^n)/4*n!,\",\"))"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A000142, A001710."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,easy",
    "offset": "3,1",

        "More terms from _Benoit Cloitre_, May 18 2002"
